Articles.Content: I don't know if it has to do with the autosave or what, but after I play for 2+ hours or so, it becomes impossible to click on anything anymore. I can't exit the game unless I kill the process in task manager, and I can't access any of my buildings or click on any of the menu options! At a loss, and really want to play more of this great game...

Read this.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-FIX-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game

Does this have to be done every time the issue arises? Or is it just a one-time fix?

Does this have to be done every time the issue arises? Or is it just a one-time fix?

It would need to be done every time you kill or fire a kerbal. However, if you install these, it's just a fire-and-forget thing (literally) and you can go mercilessly killing kerbals and firing veterans with no fear of the game falling over itself.
